DECLARE @CommunityId_cc varchar(8) DECLARE @JobNumber_cc varchar(8)
SELECT @CommunityId_cc = job.CommunityId, @JobNumber_cc = job.JobNumber FROM vJobSaleLookup vjsl INNER JOIN JOB_Jobs job ON vjsl.JobNumber = job.JobNumber WHERE vjsl.SaleId = :SaleId
exec COM_PackageOptionComponents_sel @CommunityId = @CommunityId_cc
